Title: Prohibits any governmental entity from outsourcing any function which can be performed by such entity
Summary: Prohibits any governmental entity from outsourcing any function which can be performed by such entity except where specifically authorized by law.
LawCode: Add ยง170-i, Exec L; add Art 1 Title 3 ยง10, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting any governmental entity from outsourcing any function which can be performed by such entity
